HomePage.Title: Hey I’m Hayssem!
HomePage.SubTitle: Welcome to my personal slice of the internet. I'm glad you're here!
HomePage.Desc_Part1: Professional Technical Product Manager with a passion for Data Analysis, Design, and Web development. I like to build ( and occasionally develop) astounding digital experiences with excitement for helping, guiding, and aligning requirements to deliver meaningful results.
HomePage.Desc_Part3: Currently, I'm working at Société Générale Investment Banking focused on building internal and innovative products. Additionally, I’m the Co-Founder of Confsquare, a new way to organize your event and gather with your community!
HomePage.Form1_Desc2: This new event platform enable you to build more connection between you and your community through the concept of Rooms.
HomePage.Form2_Desc1: Here you'll find about what i'ven been building on my free time
HomePage.Form2_Desc2: Always passionate about technology I tried to built small applications
HomePage.Form3_Desc1: As a Product Manager I worked on a few use case and design please go take a look and give me feedback
HomePage.Form3_Desc2: You'll find a quick description about what I've build below

AboutPage.Title: About + Resume
AboutPage.Desc: Let's get to know each other
AboutPage.Subtitle: I am Hayssem Elsayed
AboutPage.Description: Technical Product Manager + Product Owner & Scrum Master Certified
AboutPage.Description2: Passionate Technical Product Manager with over six years of hands-on experience leading successful features, products, and digital initiatives by leading projects, sprints, ensuring high-quality delivery, exercising collaborative team and stakeholder management. I strive to always be up to speed on different topics including coding and design to be able to deliver and discuss with all stakeholders.
AboutPage.Description3: I fled from a traditional path and explored my creativity, by trying my hands on various techniques and technologies. Product Management is more than just a profession for me, and I try to dig deep into it. Today, I like to use my skills for critical thinking, empathy, and creativity to create viable and impactful solutions.
AboutPage.SoftSkillsInit: Here what I did building Product:
AboutPage.TechSkillsInit: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

Manager_Talan.Title: IT & Operations Manager
Manager_Talan.SubTitle: Talan Americas | Montreal, CAN
Manager_Talan.Task1: • Defined a global consultant follow-up strategy for the company's most important client.
Manager_Talan.Task2: • Designed a personalized career plan for each of the resources (+30 consultants).
Manager_Talan.Task3: • Reached business objectives by becoming the second most important supplier for our customers.
Manager_Talan.Achievement: I contributed to the increase in the number of resources on the perimeter by 13%.

Experience2.Title: Société Générale Corporate & Investment Banking
Experience2.SubTitle: Product Manager
Experience2.Perimeter: Product: Corporate Information Systems, Innovation & New Products
Experience2.Task1: • Managed a portfolio of 4 products from ideation to launch.
Experience2.Task2: • Gathered metrics before and after product launch, visible through dashboards.
Experience2.Task3: • Designed wireframes and built prototypes of web applications.
Experience2.Task4: • Unlocked the budget for 2 new products by successfully pitched execs.
Experience2.Task5: • Decreased feature deployment time by 33% by building CI/CD pipelines.
Experience2.Task6: • Reached 95% of time reduction for certain manual tasks and earned 100% adoption after 2 weeks by deploying a web application.

Experience3.Title: Société Générale Corporate & Investment Banking
Experience3.SubTitle: Product Manager
Experience3.Task1: • Designed and led the division’s new product strategy (with around $1M budget).
Experience3.Task2: • Introduced Scrum and led daily meetings of five people.
Experience3.Task3: • Deployed API that increased consumption of data by 48%.
Experience3.Task4: • Designed the perimeter architecture that resulted in a 56% infrastructure costs reduction.

Experience4.Title: BNP Paribas Cardif
Experience4.SubTitle: Technical Project Manager
Experience4.Text: Technical Project Manager who coordinates several new solutions' design, development, and deployment for different teams
Experience4.Task1: • Designed and led a team of 3 engineers to develop and deploy a data warehouse.
Experience4.Task2: • Deployed to new web product within 7 months, reducing TTM by 21% over reviewing the infrastructure architecture and software deployment process.

Experience5.Title: Société Générale
Experience5.SubTitle: Business Analyst
Experience5.Text: Junior Business Analyst in the Trade Services division within the Steering team, which gathers data from different sources and builds indicators for both sales and back-office teams to improve their activities.
Experience5.Task1: • Coordinated with business owners to define, track, build new reports and KPI’s.
Experience5.Task2: • Decided which metrics would most likely help the sales teams in their activity and increase their performance.

StartUp1.Title: Confsquare
StartUp1.SubTitle: Co-Founder
StartUp1.Text: Designed and built a web application that enables users to create a new form of events based on the concept of rooms.  The rooms helps the broadcaster create a new kind of dynamic with the guests but also for the guests among themselves.
StartUp1.Technologies: React, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Docker, Firebase
